casebody.data:
LOGAN, Respondent, v. BERKSHIRE APARTMENT ASS'N, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County,

General Term.

May 8, 1893.) Action by William J. Logan against the Berkshire Apartment Association.

Argued before BOOKSTAYER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

Stickney, Spencer & Ordway, for appellant. Lyon & Smith, for respondent.

No opinion. Motion for leave to appeal to the court of appeals denied, with $10 costs. See 22 N. Y. Supp. 776.
